title: Biden Administration Seeking Additional $30 Billion for Covid-19 Response
sub_head: The request includes funds for antivirals and testing capacity; Republicans are wary of further spending
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Biden administration told Congress it needs an additional $30 billion in coronavirus response aid, according to people familiar with the matter.
Health and Human Services Department officials outlined the request for additional aid in a briefing with congressional staff on Tuesday, the people said. The request includes $17.9 billion for medical countermeasures like antivirals, $4.9 billion for testing capacity and $2.7 billion to combat future variants, the people said.
